name: Slender: The 5 Pages
description:
You wake up in a house, in a abandoned forest. You have to find your way out. The only way to get out is to find the 5 pages. Be careful, Slender Man doesn't like when people take his pages. Many have tried, none have succeeded. Will you be the first?

I was taking part in a "Educational Programm" and the final exercise was to make our own game. So I decided to pay my respects to my favorite childhood creepypasta. In the 7z document is the .exe file for the game and also a .JPEG image of the game's map.  I apologize if the game doesn't have a high qualaty. (It's my first ever game and it was made in 3 days)

ONLY USE THE MAP IF YOU ARE REALLY STRUGGLING BECAUSE IT WILL RUIN THE GAME.
